Parameters: The name of the app event.
Extra data included with the app event. The data can be null.
onAppEvent(java.lang.String, java.lang.S.Description: Called when an app event occurs.
onAppEvent(java.lang.String, java.lang.S.FullName: public abstract void onAppEvent (String name, String data)

ClassDesc: A listener interface for app events triggered by ads. App events allow JavaScript within an ad to trigger events in the application. The ad can trigger the app event with a name and optional data. It is then up to the application to decide how to handle the event.
